overview: The top two extermination companies are in hot competition. Constantly competing for the top jobs, the boys of Cridder Ridders and the girls of In Sex have developed a strong animosity relieved only by their occasional on-the-job exploits. When both companies turn up on the same job it seems as if things are going to come to a head, but after a few minutes of heated discussion they realize that maybe coming together is the wiser course of action.
tagline: Get Ready For a Whack Attack!
title: In Sex
